Text: Reminds me of the time when John Lennon, when asked in an interview, if Starr was the best drummer in the world, jokingly replied, "He's not even the best drummer in the Beatles!".

Ringo has never pretended to be deep. He was always the natural clown in the band, the friendly face the kids and grannies loved.
Johnâ€™s quip about him not even being the best drummer in the Beatles was put to rest when Rolling Stone magazine recently chose Ringo as the fifth greatest rock drummer of all time.
